events.name: Competitive advantage of blockchain technology in EV battery recycling
events.wd_label: Competitive advantage of blockchain technology in EV battery recycling
events.wd_description: The competitiveness of EV manufacturers using blockchain technology compared to informal third-party EV battery recyclers, focusing on service user identification and security.
events.description: The competitiveness of EV manufacturers using blockchain technology compared to informal third-party EV battery recyclers, focusing on service user identification and security.

events.name: Service user identification
events.wd_description: EV manufacturers can accurately identify customers who need to recycle or reuse batteries using blockchain technology.
events.description: EV manufacturers can accurately identify customers who need to recycle or reuse batteries using blockchain technology.

events.name: Security
events.wd_description: EV manufacturers monitor battery safety performance through blockchain technology to ensure safety.
events.description: EV manufacturers monitor battery safety performance through blockchain technology to ensure safety.

events.name: Cooperation between competitors in EV battery recycling
events.wd_label: Cooperation between competitors in EV battery recycling
events.wd_description: The cooperation between informal third-party EV battery recyclers and EV manufacturers to achieve synergy and improve innovation performance.
events.description: The cooperation between informal third-party EV battery recyclers and EV manufacturers to achieve synergy and improve innovation performance.

events.name: Informal recyclers
events.wd_description: Informal third-party EV battery recyclers' high recycling rate and their role in the circular economy.
events.description: Informal third-party EV battery recyclers' high recycling rate and their role in the circular economy.

events.name: EV manufacturers
events.wd_description: EV manufacturers' environmental protection and technical advantages in battery recycling.
events.description: EV manufacturers' environmental protection and technical advantages in battery recycling.

events.name: Application of blockchain technology in EV battery recycling
events.wd_label: Application of blockchain technology in EV battery recycling
events.wd_description: The decision-making process of EV manufacturers regarding the application of blockchain technology in the three stages of the EV battery recycling industry.
events.description: The decision-making process of EV manufacturers regarding the application of blockchain technology in the three stages of the EV battery recycling industry.

events.name: Initial stage
events.wd_description: In the early stage, EV manufacturers are unaware of the advantages of adopting blockchain and tend to refuse its application under low subsidy and penalty policies.
events.description: In the early stage, EV manufacturers are unaware of the advantages of adopting blockchain and tend to refuse its application under low subsidy and penalty policies.

events.name: Intermediate stage
events.wd_description: The decision-making process in the intermediate stage, influenced by revenue and cost considerations.
events.description: The decision-making process in the intermediate stage, influenced by revenue and cost considerations.

events.name: Mature stage
events.wd_description: The decision-making process in the mature stage, where high revenue and subsidy lead to the adoption of blockchain technology.
events.description: The decision-making process in the mature stage, where high revenue and subsidy lead to the adoption of blockchain technology.

events.name: Smart EV battery reverse supply chain
events.wd_label: Smart EV battery reverse supply chain
events.wd_description: The construction of a smart EV battery reverse supply chain consisting of an EV manufacturer and a third-party EV battery recycler under government supervision.
events.description: The construction of a smart EV battery reverse supply chain consisting of an EV manufacturer and a third-party EV battery recycler under government supervision.

events.name: Third-party recycler
events.wd_description: The role of the third-party EV battery recycler in the smart reverse supply chain, including cooperation strategies.
events.description: The role of the third-party EV battery recycler in the smart reverse supply chain, including cooperation strategies.

events.name: Government supervision
events.wd_description: The role of government supervision in the smart reverse supply chain, including subsidy and penalty policies.
events.description: The role of government supervision in the smart reverse supply chain, including subsidy and penalty policies.

events.name: Behavioral decisions in EV battery recycling
events.wd_label: Behavioral decisions in EV battery recycling
events.wd_description: The relationship between the behavioral decisions of the EV manufacturer, third-party recycler, and government in the EV battery recycling industry.
events.description: The relationship between the behavioral decisions of the EV manufacturer, third-party recycler, and government in the EV battery recycling industry.

events.name: EV manufacturer decisions
events.wd_description: The probability of the EV manufacturer choosing blockchain adoption influenced by government supervision.
events.description: The probability of the EV manufacturer choosing blockchain adoption influenced by government supervision.

events.name: Government decisions
events.wd_description: The impact of high penalties and subsidies on the government's supervision strategy.
